column5: Hi all, Went out with my boy for 2 hours last night. He will fish for about 5 minutes usually then he's done....lol....lucky for me he just loves being in the boat. Last night i find out he is not only excellent company but an accomplished net man too!VIDEO LINK (change setting to HD in Youtube)http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KPizNjzIrFQhttp://i263.photobucket.com/albums/i...l/IMG_5516.jpghttp://i263.photobucket.com/albums/i...l/IMG_5517.jpghttp://i263.photobucket.com/albums/i...l/IMG_5518.jpg
Great stuff here!How old is your son?
Pretty awesome to have a good fishing buddy like that. Thanks for posting them.
Too cute: Yup -- You got a couple of "keepers" there - the fish and your Son.
Thanks for the replies Jack is 4 years old......a real chatterbox and comedian....gets the chatterbox from mum....not sure where the comedian comes from.....lol.
you have a great fishing buddy. Nice vid & pics. Did you eat that nasty bullhead?
Good stuff SimonThe young man is coming along nicely
It's always heart warming to see great memories like this being made
